analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x5abbe7b5e08b812f42238b367d1cc51c2555de56.sol:
	Contract _0xTestToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x5abbe7b5e08b812f42238b367d1cc51c2555de56.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

_0xTestToken._BLOCKS_PER_READJUSTMENT should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x5abbe7b5e08b812f42238b367d1cc51c2555de56.sol#218-219)
_0xTestToken._MAXIMUM_TARGET should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x5abbe7b5e08b812f42238b367d1cc51c2555de56.sol#229-232)
_0xTestToken._MINIMUM_TARGET should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x5abbe7b5e08b812f42238b367d1cc51c2555de56.sol#219-224)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_contracts/0x5abbe7b5e08b812f42238b367d1cc51c2555de56.sol#382:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
